1.text: Wrap earring wire or a paperclip twice around a pen.

2.text: Cut the ends of the wire off to make an open loop.

3.text: File the edges or add dots of hot glue so they aren’t sharp anymore.

4.text: Bend the wire until it’s about as wide as your lip.

5.text: Slide the opening over your lip and move it to one side of your mouth.

6.text: Mark a spot just beneath your lower lip with eyeliner.

7.text: Dip the back of a fake diamond into eyelash glue.

8.text: Press the fake diamond onto the dot you made for about 10 seconds.

9.text: Remove the glue with makeup remover when you want to take it off.
